title: MEGADETH & QUEENS OF THE STONE AGE Booked For Bonnaroo 2025
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 4 hours ago
text: Bonnaroo Music & Arts Festival is set to take place between June 12 and 15 on the Bonnaroo Farm, located just 60 miles southeast of Nashville in Manchester, TN. This year's festival is hardly heavy, though it does feature Megadeth opening for Tyler, The Creator and Queens Of The Stone Age as one of the headliners for the Sunday show. The Friday show also features Insane Clown Posse, should anyone feel the urge to get real weird with things. Tickets are available here. As for the two aforementioned bands, Megadeth is currently working on a new record and Queens of the Stone Age has a bunch of rescheduled shows from last year for this June. Check 'em out below. 6/19 Boston, MA MGM Music Hall at Fenway6/11 Boston, MA MGM Music Hall at Fenway6/18 Cincinnati, OH The Andrew J Brady Music Center6/20 Madison, WI Breese Stevens Field6/21 Chicago, IL Huntington Bank Pavilion at Northerly Island Want More Metal? html:
Bonnaroo Music & Arts Festival is set to take place between June 12 and 15 on the Bonnaroo Farm, located just 60 miles southeast of Nashville in Manchester, TN. This year's festival is hardly heavy, though it does feature Megadeth opening for Tyler, The Creator and Queens Of The Stone Age as one of the headliners for the Sunday show. The Friday show also features Insane Clown Posse, should anyone feel the urge to get real weird with things. Tickets are available here.

As for the two aforementioned bands, Megadeth is currently working on a new record and Queens of the Stone Age has a bunch of rescheduled shows from last year for this June. Check 'em out below.

6/19 Boston, MA MGM Music Hall at Fenway
6/11 Boston, MA MGM Music Hall at Fenway
6/18 Cincinnati, OH The Andrew J Brady Music Center
6/20 Madison, WI Breese Stevens Field
6/21 Chicago, IL Huntington Bank Pavilion at Northerly Island
